segments.text: The kitchen counters are cluttered with dishes waiting to be done.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is making everything soggy and gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle on the floor looks filthy already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in it, ugh, so careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids fingering the cookies, who knows if their hands are clean.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's wobbling, but they're ignoring the mess below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinets, it'll ruin them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the thought of all that dampness spreading.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand out, probably for a sticky cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is just nasty with the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty window view can't hide the grime building up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dish towel she's using might get soaked next.
segments.speaker: PAR
